@graph.name: Functional annotation
@graph.description:
Functional annotation of protein sequences

## Associated Tutorial

This workflows is part of the tutorial [Functional annotation of protein sequences](https://training.galaxyproject.org/training-material/topics/genome-annotation/tutorials/functional/tutorial.html), available in the [GTN](https://training.galaxyproject.org)

## Features

* Includes [Galaxy Workflow Tests](https://training.galaxyproject.org/training-material/faqs/gtn/workflow_run_test.html)
